Rulings.Tengu:
●You cannot activate this card if you have no Neo-Spacian monsters in your GY and/or no Chrysalis monsters in your Deck.
●You cannot activate this card if there are fewer Chrysalis monsters in your Deck than there are Neo-Spacian monsters with different names in your GY.
●You cannot activate this card if you have fewer open Monster Card Zones than the number of Neo-Spacian monsters with different names in your GY.
●Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin counts as 2 Neo-Spacian monsters with different names for this card's effect. If you have 1 Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin in your GY, you can Special Summon 2 Chrysalis monsters from your Deck.

Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate this card if you have no "Neo-Spacian" monsters in your GY and/or no "Chrysalis" monsters in your Deck.
2. You cannot activate this card if there are fewer "Chrysalis" monsters in your Deck than there are "Neo-Spacian" monsters with different names in your GY.
3. You cannot activate this card if you have fewer open Monster Card Zones than the number of "Neo-Spacian" monsters with different names in your GY.
4. "Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin" counts as 2 "Neo-Spacian" monsters with different names for this card's effect. If you have 1 "Neo-Spacian Marine Dolphin" in your GY, you can Special Summon 2 "Chrysalis" monsters from your Deck.
